author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Melrose Industries Issues ‍Statement Regarding GKN Defence Document​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Melrose Industries:
* ‍STATEMENT REGARDING GKN PLC DEFENCE DOCUMENT​ * ‍MELROSE WILL BE WRITING TO GKN SHAREHOLDERS IN DUE COURSE WITH ITS DETAILED RESPONSE.​
* ‍CONTINUES TO BELIEVE THAT IT WILL BE ABLE TO OBTAIN RELEVANT CLEARANCES WITHIN PARAMETERS PERMITTED BY CITY CODE TIMETABLE.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
